ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah i agree about drel in naj...i camped her with an ench for like 12 hours, and we both got 1 pair......but it took about 6 hours for hers, and the other 6
ygData.messageBody:
yeah i agree about drel in naj...i camped her with an ench for like 12 hours,
and we both got 1 pair......but it took about 6 hours for hers, and the other 6
for mine...and we killed her about 30 times altogether....was pretty messed up
if you ask me

Lanadina the Magician wrote:

> From: Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
>
> I couldnt agree with you more!!!! Last night Fennin Ro had OVER 1950 people
> on that ONE server!!!!!! They need to lock that server down completely and
> possibly move any level 10 and below character over to another server.
> Personally, I don't think ANY server should have more than 500 people on it.
>
> Also, they need to have more than one zone carry certain 'very saught' after
> items, such as Rubicite armor. Why does Cazic Thule have to be the only
> zone? Of COURSE there will be 70-100 people in the zone! Move the Ruby
> around...put some in Rathe Mountains, make a level 25+ zone on Erudin so
> Ruby can drop there....but not all in one zone. Look at the Journeyman
> boots. ONE NPC in the entire game has it, its a no drop item, meaning you
> have to loot it yourself. Why cant this npc drop it everytime to stop
> overcamping and people from Kill stealing? No, that would make way too much
> sense, I guess.
>
> Over camping and lagging CAN end if some of the ideas that so many have sent
> in are implemented. But of course, that would cause Verant having to
> actually DO something...can't have that. (naww...I'm not upset heheh <grin>)
>
> Lanadina
